text: Lynda Aguirre Thomas (born 21 December 1981), known professionally as Lynda, is a Mexican musician, singer, songwriter and activist. She achieved recognition in her native Mexico during the late 1990s and early 2000s. She was signed to EMI Capitol Records and released four studio albums.Her last album, Polen, was released in 2001 and she retired shortly afterwards. ==See also== *Ir√°n Castillo *Litzy *Darina *Myriam Montemayor Cruz *Patricia Manterola *Noelia *Jeans Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican singers Category:Mexican activists
title: Lynda Thomas
